00089    // Inline method definitions
00090    
00091    /* 
00092    * Return interaction energy for one tether
00093    */
00094    inline double HarmonicTether::energy(double rSq, int type) const
00095    {  return 0.5*kappa_[type]*rSq; }
00096 
00097    /* 
00098    * Return force / distance for one tether, for use in MD
00099    */
00100    inline double HarmonicTether::forceOverR(double rSq, int type) const
00101    {  return -kappa_[type]; }
